revision_content.description: Covers foundational concepts in types of numbers, operations, and number properties.

subtopics.title: Natural Numbers
notes: Does not include 0 or negative numbers

subtopics.title: Integers
notes: Used in temperature, money loss/gain, elevation, etc.

subtopics.title: Rational Numbers
notes: Can be expressed as a fraction a/b (b ≠ 0)

subtopics.title: Irrational Numbers
notes: Cannot be written as exact fractions

subtopics.title: Real Numbers
notes: Basically, any number you can think of on a number line

subtopics.title: Prime Numbers
notes: Natural numbers greater than 1 with only 2 factors: 1 and itself
Note: 1 is NOT a prime number

subtopics.title: Composite Numbers
notes: Natural numbers that have more than 2 factors

subtopics.title: LCM and HCF
notes: LCM (Least Common Multiple): Smallest number divisible by both
HCF (Highest Common Factor): Largest number that divides both
Use prime factorization to find LCM/HCF

subtopics.title: Number Line
notes: Negative to left, positive to right

subtopics.title: Standard Form
notes: The usual way of writing numbers

subtopics.title: Rounding and Estimation
notes: Used for quick calculations and approximations
